rooms.description: Two-car garage space accommodating wheelchair accessibility.
Open-plan area combining living room, dining area, and kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Vastu compliant orientation.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and proper lighting.
Wheelchair accessible bedroom with a spacious balcony for relaxation and natural light. Features floor-to-ceiling windows.
Compact bedroom ensuring privacy, with access to a balcony.

additional_features.description: All rooms incorporate eco-friendly, locally-sourced materials and energy-efficient solutions.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light. Solar panels planned for future upgrades.
All entry points, doorways and pathways are designed to be wheelchair accessible.
